rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the facade for natural lighting, complemented by traditional Kerala-style architectural elements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern yet traditional kitchen integrated with the living area, designed for optimal workflow and storage. It has floor-to-ceiling windows to bring in natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, the dining room features ample seating and an open layout with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural brightness.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A central living space designed with traditional Kerala aesthetics and modern comforts, featuring a large area with floor-to-ceiling windows for a panoramic view.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed with privacy and comfort in mind, incorporating traditional Kerala interior design elements.

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.description: A second guest bedroom, offering an alternative option for visitors. Includes traditional decor and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space with floor-to-ceiling windows, designed for quiet study and relaxation. Traditional Kerala motifs are incorporated in the interior.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A multipurpose utility room for storage and appliances, designed with traditional materials.

openings.description: Large wooden entrance door aligned with traditional Kerala design, incorporating Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows across the front elevation for optimal natural lighting and ventilation.
Additional floor-to-ceiling window series along the rear elevation to ensure balanced light distribution and maintain privacy.
